00076         Object getParam(string name){return *params[name];}
00077         void addParam1(string name,string type,Object &obj){ntmap1[name]=type;params1[name]=&obj;}
00078         void addParam1(string name,Object &obj){params1[name]=&obj;}
00079         Object getParam1(string name){return *params1[name];}

00088         /**********SELECT QUERIES ONE ROW/ALL COLS/SOME COLS(WHR),ALL ROWS/ALL COLS/SOME COLS(WHR),ALL ROWS/ONE COL(WHR) START********/
00089         template<class T> vector<T> getARAC()
00090         {
00091                 igPaWC = true;
00092                 T t;
00093                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00094                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00095                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00096                 void* vect = getARACW(clasName);
00097                 if(vect!=NULL)
00098                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00099                 igPaWC = false;
00100                 return *vecT;
00101         }
00102         template<class T> vector<T> getARACW()
00103         {
00104                 igPaWC = false;
00105                 T t;
00106                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00107                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00108                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00109                 void* vect = getARACW(clasName);
00110                 if(vect!=NULL)
00111                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00112                 igPaWC = true;
00113                 return *vecT;
00114         }
00115         template<class T> vector<T> getARSCW(vector<string> cols)

00119                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00120                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00121                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00122                 void* vect = getARSCW(clasName,cols);
00123                 if(vect!=NULL)
00124                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00125                 igPaWC = true;
00126                 return *vecT;
00127         }

00141         template<class T> T getOR(int id)
00142         {
00143                 igPaWC = false;
00144                 clearMaps();
00145                 Object on;
00146                 on << id;
00147                 addParam("id",on);
00148                 vector<string> cols;
00149                 T t;
00150                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00151                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00152                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00153                 void* vect = getORW(clasName);
00154                 if(vect!=NULL)
00155                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00156                 igPaWC = true;
00157                 return vecT->at(0);
00158         }
00159         template<class T> T getORW()
00160         {
00161                 igPaWC = false;
00162                 T t;
00163                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00164                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00165                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00166                 void* vect = getORW(clasName);
00167                 if(vect!=NULL)
00168                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00169                 igPaWC = true;
00170                 return vecT->at(0);
00171         }
00172         template<class T> vector<T> getAROC(string name)
00173         {
00174                 igPaWC = true;
00175                 vector<string> cols;
00176                 cols.push_back(name);
00177                 T t;
00178                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00179                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00180                 vector<T> *vecT = new vector<T>;
00181                 void* vect = getARSCW(clasName,cols);
00182                 if(vect!=NULL)
00183                         vecT = (vector<T>*)vect;
00184                 igPaWC = false;
00185                 return *vecT;
00186         }

00206         template<class T> void insertORSC(T t,vector<string> cols)
00207         {
00208                 igPaWC = true;
00209                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00210                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00211                 insertORSC(&t,cols,clasName);
00212                 igPaWC = false;
00213         }

00239         template<class T> void bulkInsertRAC(vector<T> vecT)
00240         {
00241                 allocateStmt(true);
00242                 for(unsigned int k=0;k<vecT.size();k++)
00243                 {
00244                         T t = vecT.at(k);
00245                         insertORAC<T>(t);
00246                 }
00247         }
00248         template<class T> void bulkInsertRACW(vector<T> vecT)
00249         {
00250                 allocateStmt(true);
00251                 for(unsigned int k=0;k<vecT.size();k++)
00252                 {
00253                         T t = vecT.at(k);
00254                         insertORACW<T>(t);
00255                 }
00256         }
00257         template<class T> void bulkInsertRSC(vector<T> vecT,vector<string> cols)
00258         {
00259                 allocateStmt(true);
00260                 for(unsigned int k=0;k<vecT.size();k++)
00261                 {
00262                         T t = vecT.at(k);
00263                         insertORSC<T>(t,cols);
00264                 }
00265         }
00266         template<class T> void bulkInsertRSCW(vector<T> vecT,vector<string> cols)
00267         {

00270                 {

00273                 }

00278         /**********UPDATE QUERIES ROWS/ALL COLS/SOME COLS(WHR) START**********/
00279         template<class T> void updateRsAC(T t)
00280         {
00281                 igPaWC = true;
00282                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00283                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00284                 vector<string> cols;
00285                 updateORSC(&t,cols,clasName);
00286                 igPaWC = false;
00287         }

00340         template<class T> int getNumRows()
00341         {
00342                 igPaWC = true;
00343                 T t;
00344                 const char *mangled = typeid(t).name();
00345                 string clasName = demangle(mangled);
00346                 int size = *(int*)sqlfuncs("COUNT(*)","int");
00347                 igPaWC = false;
00348                 return size;
00349         }
